Reviews.Title: Excellent bundle
Reviews.Author: Zach
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time, with all accessories! Overall great deal. Really happy with purchase. Everything i need as a start-up user of DSLR camera and even more. Camera is mint, tripod is super since its really light weight, and so many type of lenses and accessories..:). Would recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: buy a Cannon camera came defective and did not answer ... liars not buy here
Reviews.Author: Rosa María Migliore
Reviews.Content: The purchase of this camera was a failure, came with factory defects and threw me an error 30 on the screen (not take pictures). I sent emails more than 7 to the store to exchange or ask a refund and I never specifically said we could solve the problem. Never gave me the shipping address. This camera is my tool for work and had to send in a Canon repair shop, the repair cost of more than $ 300. I have the repair bill and replaced the item. I feel cheated by the store from which you purchased this combo with great enthusiasm and I solved my problem. Still I have hopes that the store will handle defective camera and extra spending had to cancel for repairYou wrote me several emails saying that they could only cover up to $ 100 of the amount paid, but I had to delete the negative comment had placed the money to me and it would take 3 to 5 business days for refund, and then delete the comment and directed and now they tell me that I will return any money I feel cheated by you are a metirosos I have more than a month on this problem and I solved all I have saved all emails showing what I say, do not buy in this store are liars

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: kkj00041
Reviews.Content: I bought this few days ago. It arrive at 22, one day before my estimated shipping time (it was 23- 25) I liked the way that It came earlier than it said.However, I was one thing that I was not satisfied, 1- UV, Florescent, Polarizer Filter Kit was damaged However, seller tried to solve this. and I'm glad in resultI was happy with the camera. Its good for gift, they really liked it . I am happy with tripod, memory card, camera bag- small size so that it is actually easy to carry around . I gave as gift to someone and they loved what I gave to them Overall, the UV, Florescent, Polarizer Filter Kit was damaged , seller was nice to solve problem.My rate of product wasKit Includes!1- Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm IS II Lens USA w/ All Supplied Accessories - Pretty good. Well what do I say? This was reason why I ordered it if it was not good I would be really mad1- 32GB SDHC Memory Card #Don't Miss a Memory!# -it was good too. I was little worried because picture did not said anything about class, but this was 10 class which was pretty good.1- USB SDHC Memory Card Reader #Download Images Quicker!# -1- Lithium Ion High Capacity Battery #Great for Vacation!# -Good1- Ac/Dc Rapid Battery Charger #Great For Vacation!#  -Good1- UV, Florescent, Polarizer Filter Kit#Protect Your Lens!# - it was damaged so, I `m not sure how it works1- 58mm 2x telephoto lens - it was okay, if you do close zoom you defiantly see lens through screen #You can see black round on screen if you do close zoom#1- 58mm Super Wide Angle Lens -1- Shock Proof Case #Protect Your Camera!# - small but it does its job (actually its better than bigger one for bundle kit because I have DSLR myself and my bag is TOO big so, I think it was smart idea to have smaller bag.1- Professional Full Size Tripod 1- Memory Card Wallet #Protect Your Photos!# - memory card wallet wise, I don't think it is really useful but maybe other ppl might use it for other thing but tripod wise my friend was really happy with it . and it looked good.1- Pack of LCD Screen Protectors #Protect from Dust And Scratches!# it does its job1- Lens/LCD Cleaning Kit -1- Mini Table Size Tripod -cute , okayI would recommend this product because it is good deal, except the lens it was great deal and seller was nice enough to give me option. I think it is great kit for starter .

Reviews.Title: Lenses are incorrect
Reviews.Author: GA Doc
Reviews.Content: Lenses included with this bundle do not work wit this camera with out converter rings which are at best unrealiable.  Contacted the seller 2 times and got a run around.  File a claim with Amazon lets see where it goes

Reviews.Title: Cannon EOS Rebel
Reviews.Author: Darrell S. Harvey
Reviews.Content: Product was as expected.  The Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm IS II Lens is great.

Reviews.Title: Good Price Even if Just for the Camera
Reviews.Author: J. André Lamoureux
Reviews.Content: The only thing bad about this package is that the little tripod is low quality and the case is a bit awkward for storing the camera and lenses. Otherwise, the product is great and the camera works wonderfully.

Reviews.Title: Nice package
Reviews.Author: msand222
Reviews.Content: Good:  Many nice extra's with the camera.  The good ones are the uv filter, extra battery, class 10 sdcard, and car charger.  The tripod is ok, but I will be buying a new one.  The bag isnt any bigger than the camera and lens, so expect to buy a new one.Bad:  Really none, as after reading other reviews, there were no surprises on the bag.Overall, I would purchase again.  Delivery was timely, and customer service answered my questions quickly.

Reviews.Title: Good deal - best I can tell
Reviews.Author: DeeAnnLee
Reviews.Content: We were interested in moving from a point&click; camera to DSLR, and all of the research pointed to this camera.  This kit contained everything as listed in the description.  If it is important to you for everything to be the same brand name, you might be disappointed.  For instance, this is a Canon camera, but one of the lenses was Vivitar.  It worked right out of the box, no problems.  We also purchased the "For Dummies" book from Amazon, and we are working our way through it. Looking forward to taking lots of cool pictures this summer!

Reviews.Title: first SLR
Reviews.Author: Haggai Lavie
Reviews.Content: my daughters first SLR, so far working great!Good quality pictures, easy interface.She's still learning all the features. but having a great time with it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Diego Nogare
Reviews.Content: I'm not an expert in cameras also I'm not a photographer... But this camera is my best friend in trips.

Reviews.Title: Great starter set
Reviews.Author: RottenCandy
Reviews.Content: The kit is great for a beginning photographer. I did replace the sd card and the bag pretty quickly, but overall I use everything else on a regular basis. I am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: F. Stanley
Reviews.Content: Bought this package for my daughter photography package. She loves it and so far has gotten good reports from using this for her projects. All the listed equipment was with the camera. I highly recommend this bundle package. No problems at all. KUDOS!!!

Reviews.Title: Rebel
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: This kit is a great value if you are looking for a Canon Rebel camera. This kit is lees then just the camera alone.  But I will add that the tripod and camera bag are really useless. I would never buy either one alone but since they came with the kit, I'll just give them away.  The rest of the kit is great.

Reviews.Title: Good Product, Great BUY.!!!
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: Recently I purchased the T3 with the kit. This Camera is great for starters like me. Shipping was superfast. It is a great deal because it included all the necessary accessories we need.!!! Highly recommended to others!!! A+++

Reviews.Title: Great Camera! Wife Approved! lol
Reviews.Author: mtbakercs
Reviews.Content: Our first venture into the DSLR world.. this camera and kit was a great way to start... the pictures are simply amazing!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: pflores2404
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera about 2 weeks now and love it. Canon makes the best easy to use and fun to play with. I would recomend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: No clarity!
Reviews.Author: Ankit
Reviews.Content: It did not work as expected. no good clarity and does not have a SLR effect on the pictures .

Reviews.Title: Amature Photog
Reviews.Author: Awesome Angel
Reviews.Content: It has been about six months since ive had my camera and it has NOT failed me. I actually found this deal at the last second and have not regreated a single thing. My amature photography business is booming thanks to this Canon. My only suggestions are to buy a seperate case and tripod. The foldable tripod is not to sturdy for this equipment and the case looks like a lunch box. Not much protection there. Other than that, this is the best "big girl" purchase I've ever purchased. Nice entry level camera for entry level (or even professional) photographers.

Reviews.Title: Good quality with excellent price I recommend it to everyone is looking for this product Thanks this will not be my first time :
Reviews.Author: Ramy Ahmed
Reviews.Content: Good quality with excellent priceI recommend it to everyone is looking for this productThanksthis will not be my first time :)

Reviews.Title: Great price!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer M
Reviews.Content: Just received my camera bundle today after ordering it Sunday evening.  Everything stated in the description was in the package.  I haven't used the camera yet as the battery is charging, but I have examined everything that came with it.  Nothing arrived broken.  All lenses fit (some reviews stated that they didn't).  I don't know why everyone is complaining about the bag-I got everything in it, camera, lenses, filters, cleaning kit, extra battery and charger and the instruction book.  I'm excited to start taking pictures...once that battery fully charges!  In my opinion, good value for what you get...I've seen the camera body itself priced at what the bundle cost.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Cynthia G Hutchins
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter got this for her birthday . She loves it.  Good value. Iam glad I ordered it.  Nice quality

Reviews.Title: WHAT A PRICE!
Reviews.Author: Race Director - Masters of All Terrain Marathon
Reviews.Content: Well, a Canon camera is a Canon camera, and since this one came in new condition - obviously its a great camera!  If there were a 4.5 star option I might place that, simply because it came with one of those little mini tripods that are made for little cameras, and if theres a lens on your DSLR that thing can't hold it up unless its perfectly upright and nothing touches it.  But, really, who cares, there is so much other useful stuff in this package, including a very adjustable ridged tripod.Perfect package for someone starting their DSLR journey..

Reviews.Title: Best deal
Reviews.Author: Elaine M
Reviews.Content: This is the best deal I found on the camera when I purchased it. On top of that, this camera is awesome!! Great to use for a beginner and for professional photography. I received everything listed in the kit. Greeeeat starter!! As others have mentioned, the bag isn't big enough. I did purchase a different bag. Other than that, I'm still using it and love this camera/kit.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Briana
Reviews.Content: i got it on time with everything and more then i knew i was getting i love my camera it takes the most amazing pictures!!!!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm IS ll Lens
Reviews.Author: Teresa Bartlett "Tesstan1"
Reviews.Content: When I received this package, I had found through the receipt that I was not going to get the special package that was advertised.  I did receive part of the order, the main thing missing is the zoom lens.  After many calls to explain what the problem was, I finally received the zoom lens.  I didn't receive all that was on the special but at that point I was just tired of bothering with it which I'm sorry about.  There was other things that were missing INCLUDING a coupon that was supposed to go on any future orders because of the problems encountered.  By the time I finally received the missing lens I was so relieved I decided to let the other stuff go.  I was ALSO supposed to receive 2 wireless remotes for the camera but they were supposed to arrive by Jan 12, at the latest (not exactly positive about the date).  I received an email saying the items had been shipped out but that no other tracking would be available.  So I start my waiting for this.  At least two weeks after the due date, I emailed them telling them I never received the remotes.  I then received an email saying the order had been cancelled and that I should receive the refund on my credit card soon, I believe it was within two weeks.  I was supposed have gotten one of the remotes free because toward the end of the receipts online it showed what you could get as "add-ons".  I had called about this and was told to go ahead and order and the price would be deleted once they had received the order.  And of course this wasn't done.  One error, no problem, it was almost fixable... two errors, ok, again, it was fixable... three errors, not so happy, but still gave them the benefit of the doubt... four errors, I give up, they win.  Unfortunately with that win includes the best or worst type of advertisement, word of mouth.I gave four stars for the quality of the camera, NOT for the package because I didn't get the package as advertised.  If the stars were strictly for the advertised special, it would definitley NOT be above three stars.If you order any of the packages, be sure to check and recheck the special you've ordered.  It changed for me on the last part of the order.. the page you receive saying you have placed the order and thank you for the order and the expected date to receive it.If the question is would I order it again... probably but absolutely not with out checking and double checking the package.

Reviews.Title: Quick delivery
Reviews.Author: Micaela Gomez
Reviews.Content: I researched the price for a few months before purchasing. Although I was not familiar with the seller, I gave them a try. Arrived before the promised timed. Items in the description were included and were as described. Could not be any happier with the purchase and the seller. It was a great value.

Reviews.Title: Just "OK"
Reviews.Author: KS
Reviews.Content: The camera is great, but some of the accessories are 'cheap'.  I definitely will be buying a better camera case to protect my investment!  Also, not sure I will risk using the tabletop tripod. Haven't tried the additional lenses yet.  How do I access my protection plan?  On the upside, the packaging was great and it arrived quickly.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: enoch steele
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping well packaged box. Everything has its own container and the camera is amazing and all the goodies with it just tops it off!!

Reviews.Title: canon t3
Reviews.Author: Corey
Reviews.Content: the camera works great.  this was a great price for all the things you get.  I would recomend this kit to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Michael L Sortino
Reviews.Content: Our first digital SLR camera, after 15 years of point and shoot cameras.  This camera is easy to use, and takes great pictures even in auto mode.  We look forward to learning more about some of the manual settings.  The extras that came with the quit are decent quality, and the price was lower than that of the camera alone at some sites.

Reviews.Title: RECOMMENDATION
Reviews.Author: Yesenia Salas de Padilla
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product.  It fulfilled my expectations.  The delivery failed in 3 days, I was in a hurry to receive it due to a travel but it arrived just in time.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Juan Martin Lobo
Reviews.Content: The camera is really good, I'm enjoining everyday, all the accessories are really good, I strongly recommend to buy this product.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: maddog3241
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome buy for what you get. Everything except the tripod fits in the bag, this camera is kick a$$.......

Reviews.Title: canon eos T3
Reviews.Author: gisela solis
Reviews.Content: I find it fantastic. only one thing about is the quality less from the memory card adapter, and the box for the camera es very cheap but works for protect it.Now, I'm still trying to lear how to use it!

Reviews.Title: This is excellent
Reviews.Author: pepe
Reviews.Content: My daughter is more than happy with the camera. good quality and the price is good to.  She wants to buy more products from Kodak and the store. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: tanzaniaw13
Reviews.Content: Just got the package right now. It came with everything. Im excited to start using my camera :) For this price its so worth it you get more things then just paying for just the camera.Thanks :)

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: BethT
Reviews.Content: The items I received in this order are exactly as stated. I did have an issue with the size of the camera bag but as soon as I notified the company about the issue they resolved it within 24 hours. Thanks for great products and wonderful customer service!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Brian Slack "Sufferax"
Reviews.Content: The camera is everything I wanted and more. The fact that this kit gives you almost everything you need is evidence of it being a great starter kit. The kit arrived right on time and was everything the seller advertised it as. The brands of the kit though not the all the same brand as the camera are all quality items and recognizable brands in their own right. All the items work perfectly together and offer many choices to the novice photographer. The price for everything that you get here makes this kit unbeatable, I would recommend this kit and this seller to anyone. Thanks to the seller for providing an affordable kit that includes so much! Thank you Thank you Thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: Great deal!!!
Reviews.Author: K. Haskins
Reviews.Content: I am VERY excited about this package! We just received it yesterday and I am incredibly pleased. The camera is as described and takes fantastic pictures. I have looked at multiple sellers for this camera and through multiple companies and this is by far the best deal. The cheapest I have found the camera alone is for $499 and this package includes a lot for just an extra $10. The camera bag is too small for the camera- but who really cares when just the memory card is worth $20.00. The lenses and tripod are a huge added bonus and are a lot of fun to use.

Reviews.Title: One of the Best Camera Deals!
Reviews.Author: KMH "Just who I am."
Reviews.Content: I purchased this bundle about a month ago and I am SO happy with the products! The camera and lenses for this price was amazing, let alone all the other items that came along with it. The shipping was timely and everything arrived safely. I love my Canon DSLR! I have no complaints!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic deal for a newbie
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I wanted to upgrade from a 'point and click' to something more substantial.  I'm not a pro by any means but I wanted to have  bit more control.  I wanted a Canon Rebel and saw this package.  It is perfect for me because it includes all the basics to get me started.  Yes the camera bag is a bit small but it does fit the camera with lens, extra batteries, small tripod and filters.  The two extra lenses are also nice.  This was a great deal for all the products and I would DEFINITLEY recommend it to anyone wanting to get started with the Rebel.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS-T3
Reviews.Author: R. D. Reynolds
Reviews.Content: I would buy from this seller again in a minute. Delivery was very fast and every thing was in my order. The camera worked fine and I love it, all accessories worked as claimed and I have used them all. Canon makes a good camera and the photos are clear and vivid.I would recommend this to anyone who was looking to buy.The case is a little small but that's ok I Had a bigger one here. Good Quality I would buy it again.Very easy to use camera nothing to it I was worried I would have probs because I have had only point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: aad
Reviews.Content: Great package. It has almost everything a camera needs. But the camera bag that comes along with the package is not that great and does not fit the camera well

Reviews.Title: Great Product fast delivery
Reviews.Author: Michelle W
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera and kit. It's a great starter kit for someone beginning photography or someone who just wants great quality photos.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: alk
Reviews.Content: this is great bundle and great value! package was shipped hours after ordering which made me very happy as i am impatient.

Reviews.Title: good price
Reviews.Author: harry
Reviews.Content: I have received the camera with all accessories several days,and i like it. the camera is light and easy to use,I will try to take some pictures in the following days. I have recommended it to my friends!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Robin Jamison
Reviews.Content: This camera works well.  It is good for a beginner.  I did have a problem with one of the lens that arrived with the camera.  The company responded quickly and sent a replacement loan.  My only complaint is that the main lens did not come with a lens cover which I assumed would be standard.

Reviews.Title: Great Combo for a Beginner
Reviews.Author: Psycheotix
Reviews.Content: The camera kit comes with everything needed to start taking pictures. The tripod is a bit flimsy but I have been using it. Loved that it came with an extra battery and the 32 GB memory card. The add on lenses are fun to use and the lens filters are a must have. This is a great camera to have.

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal
Reviews.Author: Amazing Grace
Reviews.Content: I was stunned at this package and what all came with it. Now I have to learn how to use it. The ONLY thing that didn't come in the box was the person to help me learn how to use it all!!!Thanks for the great deal!!

Reviews.Title: Great for professional beginning
Reviews.Author: Pablo Garcia
Reviews.Content: Great price for all this bundle.Camera is excellent. Really nice photo quality and usageAccessories are no good quality.

Reviews.Title: So Glad I Bought This Camera!
Reviews.Author: Emily A Skrehot
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I bought this camera package. It included TONS of extra equipment you will want and need!!! If you are thinking about buying a digital SLR camera, this is a great option. I have been using this camera every day since I bought it. It takes great photos. The quality is excellent and the camera is VERY EASY TO USE. Uploading photos to your computer is also a cinch. Plus you will love all the extra equipment, including three lenses, an SD memory card, a carrying case, three filters, two tripods, two batteries and MORE!Did I mention that I ordered this camera and it arrived the NEXT DAY BY NOON???Great product and great seller. I highly recommend both.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.2 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
ISO 100 - 6400 for shooting from bright to dim light.
Improved EOS HD Movie mode with expanded recording and with in-camera video editing options.
High speed, reliable 9-point AF system utilizing a high precision, f/5.6 cross-type center point.
Includes EOS Rebel T3 digital SLR camera and EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Type II Lens; 12 megapixel CMOS sensor; Eye-level SLR viewfinder
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm IS II Lens (Black)+58mm 2x Telephoto lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens (3 Lens Kit!!!) W/32GB SDHC Memory +Extra Battery/Charger+3 PIece Filter Kit+Case+Full Size Tripod+Accessory Kit
